description: Note: edit CPA warning and alarm settings in the webapp.

enableDataPublishing.title: Publish AIS Target CPA, TCPA, Range, Bearing, Priority, and Alarm Status to SignalK (navigation.closestApproach). This is not required if just using the webapp.

enableAlarmPublishing.title: Publish AIS Target CPA and Guard warning/alarm notifications to SignalK (notifications.navigation.closestApproach). This is not required if just using the webapp.

enableEmulator.title: Enable Vesper XB-8000 Emulation. Turn this on if you intend to use the Vesper WatchMate mobile apps.
